summary: Drizzle/Zeng Jing tries to start a new life after she had betrayed her gang and hid the remains of monk.
cast: Michelle Yeoh|Woo-sung Jung|Xueqi Wang|Barbie Hsu|Shawn Yue|Xiaodong Guo|Kelly Lin|Yiyan Jiang|Leon Dai|Hee Ching Paw|Matt Chung-tien Wu|Shih-Chieh King|Pace Wu|Zonghan Li|Angeles Woo|Xiaoguang Hu|Zhi Han|Han Qing Xing|Zhan Jie Shi|Qing-xiang Li|Shu-liang Ma|Liping You|Weidong Qin|Zhi Qiang Yuan|Jun Li|Benchang You|Deshun Wang|Qi Chen|Yi Ming Qi|Min Min Lei|Lei Tong|Kim-Fai Che|Shih-Yin Chen|Pengfei Qin
title: Jian yu
